ValidationRule.description: When the Type = Contract Download Request or Contract Manual Edit Request, the Related Contract field is required to be populated.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT(ISCHANGED(IsUpdateFromCaseComment__c)), OR( ISPICKVAL( Type , "Contract: Download Request"), ISPICKVAL( Type , "Contract: Manual Edit Request")), CONTAINS(RecordType.Name, "SFDC"), RelatedContractRequest__c = NULL )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please enter the Contract # in order to submit a Contract Download Request or Contract Manual Edit Request.
